title: GE Appliances Employee Evaluation Dashboard
description: Internal tool that ingests two-week timesheet CSV files, validates and displays the raw rows, then produces actionable performance insights through KPI cards, sortable data tables, and accessible charts.

pages.name: Landing
pages.purpose: Minimalist entry point with prominent GE-blue upload button, live progress bar, and immediate preview of raw uploaded rows before aggregation

pages.name: Dashboard
pages.purpose: KPI cards, raw data preview table, aggregated employee stats table, and synchronized charts for workforce analytics

pages.name: Reports
pages.purpose: Print-optimized, paginated view for generating individual PDF evaluations

ui_components: Inline error alert with downloadable error log
Raw data preview table (first 25 rows post-upload)
Sortable aggregated employee stats table with sticky headers & keyboard nav
Off-canvas help panel with keyboard shortcuts
state: rawRows: array of unaltered CSV rows
kpis: workforce totals, averages, overtime count
interactions: Raw data preview rendered immediately after successful parse
Raw and aggregated table sort & keyboard nav
Keyboard shortcuts: U for upload, R for reports, / for search
acceptance_criteria: Upload button styled #005CB9 with white Nunito-Sans label
CSV required columns validated: employee_id, name, date, clock_in, clock_out
Duplicates flagged with downloadable error log
Raw data preview table shows first 25 rows after successful parse
Metrics calculated: total hrs, avg daily hrs, days worked, punctuality, overtime flag
KPI cards show workforce totals, averages, overtime count
Raw and aggregated tables sortable, sticky headers, row hover, keyboard nav
Charts use GE palette with pattern fills & 200% zoom labels
Aria-labels bilingual en/es, WCAG 2.2 AA focus outlines
Keyboard shortcuts documented in off-canvas help
